description: Visualize how Binary Search works. Title: 'Why Binary Search is O(log n)'. Show an array of sorted numbers 1-16 as boxes in a row. We search for 11. Step 1: Check middle (8). 11 > 8, so gray out left half (1-8). Step 2: Check middle of remaining (12). 11 < 12, gray out right. Step 3: Check middle (10). 11 > 10. Step 4: Found 11! Highlight it green. Show how each step cuts search space IN HALF. Display counter: '16 → 8 → 4 → 2 → 1'. Final: 'log₂(16) = 4 steps!' in yellow centered.
youtube_title: IT`S VERIFIED!!! | Tidal Wave [NEW TOP 1] - in Perfect Quality (4K, 60fps) - Geometry Dash
title: Tidal Wave: The New Top 1
